text: @maddow @Skepmi @maddow I think the meat and vegetables need to be tested Simply because the cross contamination jump It could be the common denominator between the ongoing covid19 cases I also have a freezer full of meat & have not taken it out Some vegetables rot too soon #healthcareconsultant
